meanings.definition: Relating to or based on the number twenty.
meanings.sent1: The vigesimal system is used in some cultures to count by twenties.
meanings.sent2: The vigesimal representation of the number 20 is simply 20.
meanings.sent3: In the vigesimal world, a score is not just a good grade but also a count of twenty.
meanings.sent4: She had a vigesimal way of organizing her belongings, grouping them in sets of twenty.
meanings.sent5: The vigesimal nature of the calendar made it easy to plan events every twenty days.

meanings.sent1: The vigesimal gathered for a meeting to discuss their community project.
meanings.sent2: A vigesimal of students volunteered to help clean up the park.
meanings.sent3: The vigesimal of friends decided to go on a camping trip together.
meanings.sent4: She counted a vigesimal of colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent5: The vigesimal of birds flying overhead created a mesmerizing sight.
